groups.name: spring.python.executor.jython
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Jython-based Python executor integration.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jython.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Jython executor autoconfiguration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jython.python-home
properties.description: Specifies the path to the Python Home directory.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jython.import-site
properties.description: Determines whether the default Python library site modules should be imported when initializing the Python interpreter.
